description:
“Most up-to-date home search app available”
“Best real estate app & I’ve tried them all!” 
“Must have for any homebuyer.” 

• Accurate: Get the most complete and accurate home data with homes updated every 15-30 minutes. 

• 20% More: Access 20% more agent-listed homes for sale than other real estate apps, and get notifications as soon as a new home hits the market. 

• Open Houses: See every open house near you and plan your weekend with the Open House Schedule. 

• Competitive: Get an edge and see which homes will sell fast. Can’t wait for the open house? Schedule a home tour with a Redfin Agent with the touch of a button. 

• Share: Easily share your favorite homes by text message, email, and social media. 

• Secret Insights: Read insights from Redfin Agents after they tour homes. 

• Search by School: Search for homes near specific schools and school districts.

• On the Go: Save your favorite homes and searches to your Redfin account and access them anytime, anywhere on the app or Redfin.com.

• Important Note: Search homes for sale in the metro areas of Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Boulder, Charlotte, Chicago, Colorado Springs, Dallas-Fort Worth, Denver, Detroit, Fort Lauderdale, Fresno, Hampton Roads, Houston, Hudson Valley, Jacksonville, Las Vegas, Long Island, Los Angeles, Madison, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis-Saint Paul, New York City, Orange County, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Portland, Raleigh-Durham, Richmond, Riverside-San Bernardino, Rhode Island, Sacramento, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Tampa, Tucson, Ventura County, Washington, DC, and West Palm Beach.
trackCensoredName: Real Estate by Redfin – Search Homes, Condos & Town Houses For Sale
trackName: Real Estate by Redfin – Search Homes, Condos & Town Houses For Sale
releaseNotes:
• See School Info: Our app is turning 6.0, so we added school information to home details pages just in time for kindergarten
• Refine Your Search: Easily input your search criteria with a redesigned filtering and search system
• Run Searches on the Map: Now you can run your saved searches and recent searches without leaving the map

If you enjoy using the Redfin app, please share the love by shouting it from the rooftops, or by leaving a review on the App Store and following @Redfin on Twitter.
